ClusterLayoutAnimator
public abstract class LayoutAnimator<V,E>
extends Object
implements Runnable

An abstract class for animating the JUNG layouts.

getMap

protected HashMap<V,PolarPoint2D> getMap()
Returns a HasMap of each vertex in the graph and it's location as a PolarPoint2D. Each PolarPoint2D has it's origin at (0,0)

Returns:
A HashMap containing the vertices and their locations.

getAttraction

protected abstract double getAttraction(V v1,
                                        V v2)
Returns the attraction force between two vertices. When attraction - repulsion is negative, the vertices are not affected. A

Parameters:
v1 - The first vertex.
v2 - The second vertex.
Returns:
The attraction force.

getRepulsion

protected abstract double getRepulsion(V v1,
                                       V v2)
Returns the repulsion force between 2 vertices. In the default implementation this is a constant.

Parameters:
v1 - The first vertex.
v2 - The second vertex.
Returns:
The repulsion force between two vertices.

getOptimum

protected double getOptimum(V v1,
                            V v2)
Returns the optimum distance for 2 vertices. Ideally this should be between 0 and 1, where 1 equals the minimum of the height and width of the layout. Normally this is repulsion minus attraction, but this method can be overriden if desired.

Parameters:
v1 - The first vertex.
v2 - The second vertex.
Returns:
The optimum distance for the 2 vertices.
